page.title: 04WEST BANK DOCK ESTATE-WIDNES
page.content: We went to the West Bank Dock Estate in the car.We saw a ship wreck, two men were digging out the mud. We saw ships going past under the bridge. The water had stones and bricks and pieces of wood in the sand and mud. Runcorn Bridge is good from underneath all the nuts and bolts look big.I liked seeing the coal trucks going over the bridge. We went past { {W.F.Hollways sand works}and{Marchem {Chemical Works.}We walked down{ {Mathieson Road}to the{Weighbridge.}We saw three lorries getting their loads weighed.I saw birds and butterflies. We brought some flowers, feathers and two moths back to put on our interest table. We were all drawing and then we got back into the car. When we got back to school we played British Bulldog and I was on it. I said thank you to the teachers. {JOANNE KUJAWIAK
